body:
> G:/cudnn/include/cudnn.h
Now tips:
```
G:\tensorflow>bazel build --config = opt --config = cuda //tensorflow:libtensorf
low.so
INFO: Options provided by the client:
  Inherited 'common' options: --isatty=0 --terminal_columns=80
INFO: Options provided by the client:
  'build' options: --python_path=C:/Python27/python.exe
INFO: Reading rc options for 'build' from g:\tensorflow\tools\bazel.rc:
  'build' options: --define framework_shared_object=true --define=use_fast_cpp_p
rotos=true --define=allow_oversize_protos=true --define=grpc_no_ares=true --spaw
n_strategy=standalone --genrule_strategy=standalone -c opt
INFO: Reading rc options for 'build' from g:\tensorflow\.tf_configure.bazelrc:
  'build' options: --action_env PYTHON_BIN_PATH=C:/Users/tao/AppData/Local/Progr
ams/Python/Python35/python.exe --action_env PYTHON_LIB_PATH=C:/Users/tao/AppData
/Local/Programs/Python/Python35/lib/site-packages --python_path=C:/Users/tao/App
Data/Local/Programs/Python/Python35/python.exe --action_env TF_NEED_OPENCL_SYCL=
0 --action_env TF_NEED_CUDA=1 --action_env CUDA_TOOLKIT_PATH=C:/Program Files/NV
IDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDA/v9.0 --action_env TF_CUDA_VERSION=9.0 --action_e
nv CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH=C:/Program Files/NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDA/v9.0 --
action_env TF_CUDNN_VERSION=7 --action_env TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=3.5 --ac
tion_env TF_CUDA_CLANG=0 --config=cuda --define grpc_no_ares=true --strip=always
 --config monolithic --copt=-w --host_copt=-w --verbose_failures
INFO: Found applicable config definition build:cuda in file g:\tensorflow\tools\
bazel.rc: --crosstool_top=@local_config_cuda//crosstool:toolchain --define=using
_cuda=true --define=using_cuda_nvcc=true

tools\bazel.rc: --define framework_shared_object=false
```
